title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin out, Doug Gottlieb fills in to react to some huge breaking news out of the NFL where Deshaun Watson’s suspension is handed out for the first 6 games of the 2022 season. He dives in on the NFL process, if commissioner Roger Goodell should step in to appeal for a longer suspension and what this means for the Super Bowl hopeful Browns this year. Plus, longtime Boston sports journalist Dan Shaughnessy joins the show to talk about the life and passing of legendary Hall of Famer Bill Russell.  

 

#douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
